${ModID}:PenanceShock.NAME: Penance Shock
${ModID}:PenanceShock.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! ${ModID}:Penance. NL Channel 1 Lightning.

${ModID}:WeightofContrition.NAME: Weight of Contrition
${ModID}:WeightofContrition.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Penance. NL Increase ${ModID}:Penance HP loss by !${ModID}:m2! this combat.

${ModID}:ChainsofTruth.NAME: Chains of Truth
${ModID}:ChainsofTruth.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Penance to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:HolyWrath.NAME: Holy Wrath
${ModID}:HolyWrath.DESCRIPTION: Take !M! damage. NL Return this from the discard pile to your hand whenever you gain ${ModID}:Confession.

${ModID}:Absolution.NAME: Absolution
${ModID}:Absolution.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Penance. NL Whenever a creature is damaged by ${ModID}:Penance this turn, apply !${ModID}:m2! Weak.

${ModID}:JudgementDay.NAME: Judgement Day
${ModID}:JudgementDay.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Manifest !M! Lightning. NL Whenever a Lightning orbs passive effect activates, gain !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Confession.
